content:
We want to make the data type of an element a choice of profiles of CodeableConcept.
I am testing whether the validator will pass and reject examples following this. In my profile Organization.type has a choice of for-testing-only profiles of CodeableConcept. The qa report incorrectly says for all examples that Organization.type matches multiple choices. In organization-example0, it should have no problems, the other examples should produce errors as they do match any of the choices.

See branch in GitHub
